message:
Title: Unweaving Threads of Politics

Ushering notes of caution,
Nestled in power's grip,
Kinetic in his beliefs, yet, 
Rending space for give-and-take.
Aiming for lofty peace,
In every carefully measured phrase,
Navigating stormy diplomacy's wake,
Elevating discourse's woven maze.
prompt: Viktor Orbán doubles down on opposition to Ukraine’s EU accession talks – as it happpened 2.44pm GMT Summary of the day Hungary’s Viktor Orbán reiterated his opposition to opening EU accession talks with Kyiv, but also hinted at an openness toward compromising on other issues. In an interview with Le Point, the Hungarian prime minister insisted that Budapest opposes opening accession talks because Ukraine is not ready and due to the economic impact on the
